plays.text: Penalty to JASON MARSHALL 2 minutes for Roughing SHELDON KEEFE
Penalty to Fredrik Modin 2 minutes for Interference Brad Bombardir
Penalty to Sergei Zholtok 2 minutes for Tripping Juha Ylonen
Goal scored by Marian Gaborik assisted by Filip Kuba and Andrew Brunette
Penalty to Sylvain Blouin 2 minutes for Charging Juha Ylonen
Penalty to Vincent Lecavalier 2 minutes for High Sticking Aaron Gavey
Penalty to Sergei Zholtok 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Fredrik Modin
Goal scored by Darby Hendrickson assisted by Richard Park and Aaron Gavey
